question: In the interlaced optical force‐fluorescence (IOFF) setup described by Brau et al. in Biophysical Journal 91(3) (pages 1069–1077), what is the characteristic decay constant (i.e. the measured lifetime) of single Cy3 fluorophores under the out‐of‐phase (OP) modulation condition?

evidence.fact: The paper by Brau et al. shows that Cy3 dyes, when exposed to the OP modulation configuration, exhibit a decay constant of 32.03 ± 5.72 seconds, compared to only 1.49 ± 0.10 seconds under the in-phase condition—demonstrating roughly a 20‐fold improvement in fluorophore longevity.

According to the detailed experimental results in the Biophysical Journal paper (Brau et al., 2006), the out-of-phase modulated condition extends the lifetime of single Cy3 fluorophores to around 32 seconds.

question: What is the name of the traditional Florentine sport, dating back to the 16th century, that is played in a sand-filled arena with two teams of 27 players each?

evidence.fact: Calcio Storico, originating in Florence, Italy, is a sport that blends elements of soccer, rugby, and wrestling. Dating back to the 16th century, it is played in a sand-filled arena with two teams of 27 players each, making it a distinctive and historically rich athletic contest.

Calcio Storico, also known as historical football, is a traditional sport from Florence that emerged in the 16th century. It features two teams of 27 players competing in a sand-filled arena, with gameplay that incorporates elements of soccer, rugby, and wrestling.

question: What is the elevation above sea level of the geographic center of the Netherlands located at the Centre Spot in Lunteren?

evidence.fact: This page explains that the geographic center of the Netherlands is hidden in the woods near Lunteren on the Veluwe, with a marked location on a hill (the Koepol or Lindeboomsberg) that lies at 51 meters above sea level.

question: In the leaked Signal group chat from March 2025 that involved high‐ranking national security officials discussing imminent military operations against Yemen’s Houthi forces, what was the official name of the group chat?

evidence.fact: Jeffrey Goldberg’s reporting in The Atlantic detailed that National Security Advisor Michael Waltz created a private Signal group chat and, on March 13, mistakenly added Goldberg to it. The chat was labeled 'Houthi PC small group' and was used to coordinate sensitive war plans against the Houthis in Yemen.

Politiico’s coverage of the leak confirmed that the group chat used by senior Trump administration officials to discuss the planned Yemen strikes was named 'Houthi PC small group,' a detail that emerged only after in‐depth investigation of the leaked texts.

question: According to CMAS Underwater Hockey rules version 7.11, what is the minimum age for participants in the National Women Masters teams division for a World Championship?

evidence.fact: 0.2.2 A WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP is a tournament between nations involving one or more of the following: ... 0.2.2.4 A minimum of three (3) National Women Masters teams aged 32 years or more. A woman master must have attained her 32nd birthday on or before the first game of the competition.

1.3.2 Divisions ... 1.3.2.4 Women’s Master’s Division. Minimum age is 32. There is no upper age limit. Players age to be determined as per Rule 1.3.1. ... 1.4 Age Exceptions ... 1.4.2 The Women’s Master’s Division for World Championship of 2020 will have the minimum age of 32, just in the world championships after the minimum age will be 34.

question: What is the maximum integer number of blocks a player can fall in Minecraft without enchantments or effects and survive (assuming full health)?

evidence.fact: To calculate fall damage with no Armour, it is quite simply. Just obtain the amount of blocks high you are, and then minus 3... For example at 22 and 23 blocks high, the same damage value of 19 is generated. However at 24 blocks high, 21 hearts [damage points/half-hearts] of damage is generated... Therefore it can be confirmed 23 blocks is the largest amount of blocks high, one with only armour/no armour/ blocking can survive from.

Generally, the way fall damage works is that you lose half of the heart of health for every block fallen after you pass the first three blocks. Assuming that you have a full health bar while falling, a fall should prove to be lethal once it exceeds 23 blocks (or 23.5 to be more exact).
